nodes.text: Iseno was a planet in the Inner Rim, on the Corellian Run. Its people had a strong military tradition and maintained a large army mostly used for ornamental honor guard purposes.
During the Galactic War, a wealthy General received an arms shipment for an attempted military coup.

The planet was represented in the Galactic Senate by Ronet Coorr, who supported the Military Creation Act and was appointed to the Loyalist Committee. During the Clone Wars, Ronet Coorr moved the naval forces in Iseno—meant to reinforce the Duro system in case of a Separatist attack—to Rodia, due to a bribe from Onaconda Farr. This led to Duro being underdefended and falling to Operation Durge's Lance. Coorr's role in the scandal was exposed, forcing his disgraced resignation from the Senate and recall to Iseno.
